overview: Vanilla is most definitely an over-rated commodity in this ass-stretching, flesh-straining, dignity-defying escapade – so beware, if you like your sex on the bland side this won’t be for you. If, on the other hand, you a taste for sex with bite then you’ve most definitely cum to the right place. Benjamin Dunn, Sam Williams, Floran Mraz and Timmy Treasure push acceptability to the limits as they spank, fist, fuck and act like complete deviants for your pleasure. Don’t ever say that you haven’t been warned...
title: Opened: Twink Meets Fist!
